name: Shlink
description: Shlink is a self-hosted URL shortener with a REST API, CLI, and web interface, supporting custom short codes, QR codes, and visit tracking.

notes.text: Copy the API key from ~/shlink-install.log for API access. Configure your domain in the web interface (http://<container-ip>) or edit /opt/shlink/.env. Check logs: `cat ~/shlink-install.log` or `journalctl -eu shlink`.
